conversation.content: Hi, my coffee mug arrived cracked. Can I get a replacement or refund?
I’m very sorry about that! Could you please send us a quick photo of the damage so we can process a full refund?
Sure, here’s the photo. *[customer uploads image]*
Please cancel order #B98765. I found a cheaper option elsewhere.
No problem — let me cancel that and issue a full refund. One moment…
Your order has been cancelled and the refund is on its way. You’ll see the credit on your card in 3-5 business days. Anything else I can help with?
Can you ship my headphones to my work instead? The address is 200 Summer St, Boston MA 02210.
Absolutely! Just to confirm, you’d like them sent to 200 Summer St, Boston MA 02210 — correct?
Great — I’ve updated the address. You’ll receive a tracking email as soon as it ships.
